document_data.name: ''Neverwinter Kukri''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Neverwinter kukri''''' were [[enchanted]] exotic blades commissioned by [[Calimshan Businessman's Embassy]] in [[Neverwinter]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Powers: ''Neverwinter kukri'' possessed a ''+2'' enchantment that enhanced their damage output and guided the wielder's hand towards the target. Additionally, these weapons improved the wielder's fortitude.
document_data.History: These magic blades were a local variant of [[kukri]] found in the city of Neverwinter. They were ordered by Calimshan Businessman's Embassy especially to be gifted to individuals who culturally represented the nation of [[Calimshan]] in the north. By the late 14{{th}} century DR, some of these blades ended up on black markets and were sometimes available for purchase from dealers of magic arms and armor.
